description: Denominator of rational part of Haar measure on Grassmannian space G(n,1).
comments: Also rational part of denominator of GAMMA(n/2+1)/GAMMA(n/2+1/2) (cf. A004731).
references: D. A. Klain and G.-C. Rota, Introduction to Geometric Probability, Cambridge, p. 67.
maple: if n mod 2 = 0 then k := n/2; 2*k*Pi*binomial(2*k-1,k)/4^k else k := (n-1)/2; 4^k/binomial(2*k,k); fi;f:=n->simplify(GAMMA(n/2+1)/GAMMA(n/2+1/2));
